fields.description:
Android: Closing the emulator, 'Emulator has exited' log in not printed on console.
Its not a regression.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run a application in android emulator.
2. Close the emulator.

Actual:
no new log occur on console.

Expected:
'Emulator has exited' should occur on console.
fields.summary: Android: Closing the emulator, 'Emulator has exited' log in not printed on console.
fields.environment:
Studio : 3.0.2.201301251115
SDK version:  3.0.2.v20130201161712
CLI version : 3.0.24
OS : MAC OSX 10.7.5
XCode : 4.5.1
Android version : 4.1

comments.body:
Issue does not reproduces with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (03/11/13 15:43 0c88429)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/07/13 16:46 a4def81)
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2   
jithinpv

Reopening as it is still happening while closing the emulator.
@jithinpv please try on emulator not device.

issue does not reproduces on 
sdk 3.0.2 and 3.1.0

console out put:

[INFO] Android Emulator has exited

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (03/11/13 15:43 0c88429)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/07/13 16:46 a4def81)

Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2

Issue does not reproduces on following env.
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130412191547
Studio:3.1.0.201304121929
Machine OS : MAC 10.8
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2

Console output:
{code}
[INFO] :   Logcat shutdown successfully
[INFO] :   Emulator process exited successfully
{code}

Here it is:)
Tested with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201309132456
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.4.v20130927154557
Android Emulator:
Android API: Google APIs (Android 2.3.3)
Console output:
{code}
[INFO] :   Logcat shutdown successfully
[INFO] :   Emulator process exited successfully
{code}
